DOC.brief_summary: Examine clinical results of an interdisciplinary weight management program that includes medical evaluation, nutrition counseling, exercise, and behavioral interventions.
DOC.brief_title: Diet and Exercise in Overweight Children Postburn
DOC.criteria: 1018 years old BMI > or = 95th percentile > 1 year postburn and out of pressure garments Live within 100 minle radius of SHC Informed consent and HIPPA form signed Parent/guardia willing to make time commitment Undergone major surgery in the 4 months prior to start of program or have any major surgery planned in 2 year time frame Physical/health condition that precludes regular exercise Significant mental health diagnosis Advised by MD not to exercise Thyroid disease, routine steroid use,pregnancy Unable to understand the instructions/content of program
